desc: "The point of living is to not leave behind any regrets."

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">When playing a Companion Support Card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die (once per Round).<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">After playing a Companion Support Card:Draw 1 random Companion Support Card from your deck (once per match).
